<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>They are somewhat short, but their face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She's somewhat short with a pale skin tone.</s> <s>She has red eyes and long, brown hair tied back in an extremely long, low ponytail, with bangs swept to the right and two thick, wavy fringes on the sides that reach down to her chest.</s> <s>Her expression is relatively neutral, making it hard to read what's on her mind.</s> <s>She has a thin build.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of GLASSES</item>, <item>a BLACK DRESS SHIRT</item>, <item>a RED TIE</item>, <item>a LAB COAT</item>, <item>a pair of BLACK DRESS PANTS</item>, <item>a pair of WHITE SOCKS</item>, and <item>a pair of FLATS</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"><item>a mug of COFFEE</item></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>They are somewhat short, but their face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She's somewhat short, with a light skin tone.</s> <s>She has long, dark purple hair with straight bangs and an ahoge.</s> <s>Her hair <if cond="findInventoryItem('VIVIANS BOW', container.name, '', 'HAT') !== undefined">is tied up in a ponytail</if><if cond="findInventoryItem('VIVIANS BOW', container.name, '', 'HAT') === undefined">reaches down to her mid back</if>.</s> <s>Her eyes are light purple.</s> <s>She has a seemingly permanent scowl, making her look a little intimidating, but her size makes her appear relatively harmless.</s> <s>She has a scrawny frame.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a BLUE BOW</item>, <item>a pair of GLASSES</item>, <item>a WHITE DRESS SHIRT</item>, <item>a BLACK SUIT JACKET</item>, <item>a BLACK TIE</item>, <item>a QUIVER</item>, <item>a pair of BLACK TROUSERS</item>, and <item>a pair of FLATS</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> somewhat tall, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She's somewhat tall and has a pale complexion.</s> <s>She has long, creamsicle-orange hair with bangs in the middle.</s> <s>She has brown eyes and light brown eyebrows.</s> <s>She has a near-permanent smile, giving you the impression that she's very friendly - perhaps even a bit *too* friendly.</s> <s>She's somewhat thin with a larger than average bust.</s> <s>All of her fingernails are painted black.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> extremely tall, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>He's extremely tall, with a light skin tone.</s> <s>He has shoulder-length dark purple hair, and light purple eyes.</s> <s>He's fairly attractive with a rather cool aura about him, giving you the feeling that he's easy to get along with.</s> <s>He has a somewhat toned, slender frame and a flat chest.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> abnormally tall, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>He's abnormally tall, with a tanned skin tone and short facial hair.</s> <s>He has shoulder-length messy black hair, and light blue eyes.</s> <s>His face bears a confused expression, giving you the feeling that he's not the sharpest tool in the shed.</s> <s>He has an incredibly muscular body, nearly every inch of it you can see covered in coarse black hair.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> average height, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She's average height with moderately light skin, pink hair, and orange eyes.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> somewhat tall, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She is somewhat tall, with an average build and light skin.</s> <s>Her hair is thin and wispy and light blue in color, falling to about her mid-back.</s> <s>Half of it is tied up into a ponytail behind her head.</s> <s>Her bangs are cut along her brow and parted from the left, while two longer locks frame either side of her face.</s> <s>She has soft golden eyes that almost seem to glow, like the moon.</s> <s>She carries herself with a quiet, gentle disposition.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <if cond="container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> <if cond="container.pronouns.plural">are</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">is</if> average height, but <var v="container.pronouns.dpos"/> face is concealed.</s></if><if cond="!container.hasAttribute('concealed')"><s>She is average height with a slender build and moderately light skin.</s> <s>She has dark brown eyes and short, fluffy black hair that falls to about the middle of her neck with straight bangs cut across her brow.</s> <s>Her nails are long and well-manicured, painted a beautiful rose pink.</s> <s>Her warm smile gives you the impression that she is a kind individual, if not a bit on the shyer side.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"><item>a pair of PANTS</item> and <item>a SHIRT</item></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine Amadeus.</s> <s>It is a presence that exists solely on the MONITOR in this room.</s> <s>It has the face of a human with snow white skin.</s> <s>It has bright green eyes and short, black hair with bangs swept neatly to the left, ending just above its eye.</s> <s>Its full body is not visible all at once, but it appears to be wearing a white dress shirt with an open collar.</s> <s>It's thin, with a flat chest.</s> <s>It bears a neutral expression and shows little emotion, making it a bit unnerving...</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine <var v="container.displayName"/>.</s> <s>He's a somewhat tall older man with moderately light skin.</s> <s>He's about average weight, with a somewhat large chest.</s> <s>He has red eyes and short, black hair that's slicked over to the left in the front.</s></if> <s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> wear<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> <il name="equipment"></il>.</s> <s>You see <var v="container.pronouns.obj"/> carrying <il name="hands"></il>.</s> <if cond="container.statusString.includes('stinky')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/>'<if cond="container.pronouns.plural">re</if><if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> a little stinky.</s></if><if cond="container.statusString.includes('rancid')"><s><var v="container.pronouns.Sbj"/> smell<if cond="!container.pronouns.plural">s</if> absolutely **rancid**.</s></if></desc>
